mapper.sql: t_id, p_id, t_other_id, t_content, create_time, t_picture, t_anonymity, t_type,f_id
e.t_id, e.p_id, e.t_other_id, e.t_content, e.create_time, e.t_picture, e.t_anonymity, e.t_type, p.nickName as nickName, p.avatarUrl as avatar
mapper.select:
select
from t_evaluate e left join t_personage p on e.p_id = p.t_id
and e.t_other_id = #{tOtherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by create_time desc

select e.create_time,pe.nickName,e.t_content as eContent,i.t_content,pe.avatarUrl,i.t_id as tId,e.t_type as tType, s.t_explain ,s.t_id as sId from t_evaluate e left join t_personage pe on e.p_id=pe.t_id left join t_information i on e.t_other_id=i.t_id left join t_store s on e.t_other_id=s.t_id where e.f_id=#{fId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by e.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_evaluate (t_id, p_id, t_other_id, t_content, create_time, t_picture, t_anonymity, t_type) values (#{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tOtherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tAnonymity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

t_id,
p_id,
t_other_id,
t_content,
create_time,
t_picture,
t_anonymity,
t_type,
f_id,

mapper.update:
update t_evaluate
p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_other_id = #{tOtherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_content = #{tContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_picture = #{tPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_anonymity = #{tAnonymity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_type = #{tType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_evaluate set p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_other_id = #{tOtherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_content = #{tContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_picture = #{tPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_anonymity = #{tAnonymity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_type = #{tType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
